page.title: 18HOME LIFE-FOOD.
page.content: Information was collected from 50 family menus over a period of one week during June 1985.This shows a growing dependence on 'convenience'foods during weekdays but the 'traditional' Sunday lunch survives. {Breakfast}-Cereal and toast 78%.Cooked meal 22%.{Lunch}-Sandwiches 32%.Cold meats 22%.Pies,pasties and rolls 17% . Fruits 21%.Cakes 21% and Crisps 17%. {Dinner}-Fish and Chips 25%,Steak and Chips 23% and a Grill 23%.Cakes 36% Ice Cream 25% and Trifles 24%.{Supper} Biscuits 67%.Fruit 11% and Cake 10%.{ {Drinks}-There was no appreciable difference with drinks at any particulr meal.Tea was the most popular for each meal followed by Coffee.A typical {Sunday Lunch} consists of Beef,Yorkshire Pudding Roast Potatoes,two vegetables & Gravy with tinned fruit & cream as a sweet.
